ResumeParserData.Experience: Business Analyst  NatWest, Manchester, UK  April 2016 - Present  Requirements Gathering : Collaborated with business units to gather and document requirements, ensuring project alignment with business goals.  Process Improvement : Analyzed existing processes and implemented improvements, leading to a 15% increase in efficiency.  Data Analysis : Utilized Excel and SQL to perform detailed data analysis, supporting strategic business decisions.  Project Management : Led small to medium-sized projects, ensuring timely delivery and adherence to budget.  Stakeholder Communication : Facilitated communication between stakeholders and project teams to ensure clear understanding of project objectives.  Report Generation : Created comprehensive reports and presentations to communicate project progress and outcomes.  Junior Business Analyst  Royal Bank of Scotland (RBS) , Manchester, UK  September 2012 - March 2016  Assisted in gathering and analyzing business requirements for various projects.  Supported process improvement initiatives, contributing to enhanced operational performance.  Conducted data analysis to inform business strategies and decisions.  Assisted in managing projects, ensuring deadlines and quality standards were met.  Communicated with stakeholders to ensure project alignment with business needs.

Proven track record of leading projects to successful completion. Seeking to bring analytical expertise and project management skills to Barclays to drive strategic initiatives.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: John has an experience in the domain of 'Finance and Insurance', particularly in the sub-domain of 'Business Operations Specialists. ResumeParserData.DetailResume:
John Taylor
Address : 28 Maple Avenue, Manchester, UK
Phone : +44 9876 543210
Email : john.taylor@example.com
LinkedIn : linkedin.com/in/johntaylor

Professional Summary
Dynamic Business Analyst with 8 years of experience in financial services, skilled in data analysis, requirements gathering, and process improvement. Proven track record of leading projects to successful completion. Seeking to bring analytical expertise and project management skills to Barclays to drive strategic initiatives.

Professional Experience
Business Analyst
NatWest, Manchester, UK
April 2016 - Present
Requirements Gathering : Collaborated with business units to gather and document requirements, ensuring project alignment with business goals.
Process Improvement : Analyzed existing processes and implemented improvements, leading to a 15% increase in efficiency.
Data Analysis : Utilized Excel and SQL to perform detailed data analysis, supporting strategic business decisions.
Project Management : Led small to medium-sized projects, ensuring timely delivery and adherence to budget.
Stakeholder Communication : Facilitated communication between stakeholders and project teams to ensure clear understanding of project objectives.
Report Generation : Created comprehensive reports and presentations to communicate project progress and outcomes.
Junior Business Analyst
Royal Bank of Scotland (RBS) , Manchester, UK
September 2012 - March 2016
Assisted in gathering and analyzing business requirements for various projects.
Supported process improvement initiatives, contributing to enhanced operational performance.
Conducted data analysis to inform business strategies and decisions.
Assisted in managing projects, ensuring deadlines and quality standards were met.
Communicated with stakeholders to ensure project alignment with business needs.

Education
BSc in Economics
University of Manchester, Manchester, UK
2008 - 2012

Skills
Analytical & Problem-Solving : Strong skills in analyzing data and identifying solutions.
Data Analysis Tools : Proficient in Excel and SQL.
Project Management : Knowledgeable in Agile and Waterfall methodologies.
Communication : Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Organizational : Ability to manage multiple tasks and meet deadlines.

Certifications
Certified Business Analysis Professional (CBAP) 

Personal Attributes
Analytical Mindset : Strong critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
Collaborative Nature : Effective team player with strong interpersonal skills.
Proactive Approach : Highly motivated with a proactive attitude.
Customer Focus : Dedicated to understanding and meeting client needs.
